alert.note: Alert for Estill; Jackson; Lee; Owsley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Owsley, Estill, northeastern Jackson and western Lee Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 159 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kings Station, or near Irvine, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Witt, Weedon, Calloway Crossing and Locust Branch around 205 PM EDT. Irvine, Station Camp, Wisemantown, South Irvine, West Irvine, Jinks, North Irvine and Alcorn around 210 PM EDT. Ravenna, Wagersville, Doe Creek, Cow Creek, Willow Tree and Blanton Flats around 215 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Alumbaugh, Drip Rock, Pitts, Leighton, Shade, Texola, Pryse, Cobhill, Wind Cave, Beattyville, Evelyn, Willow Shoals, Pinnacle, Yellow Rock, Old Landing, Crystal, Whynot, Heidelberg and Caryton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
